column4: I'm using the default NetworkManager under Karmic...I want to use OpenDNS...do I have to set it up individually on every wireless connection I use?
use wicd instead of networkmanager, it works well with opendns and you only have to set it up once
I might check into wicd later on (I used to use it back when it was the only way for Ubuntu to talk to my campus network), but for now I'm looking for a NetworkManager solution.
